channel.title: CVE Feed for fancy-product-designer -- all

item.title: CVE-2021-4096|2024-08-03T17:16:04.128Z -- fancy-product-designer -- fancy%20product%20designer
item.description: The Fancy Product Designer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery via the FPD_Admin_Import class that makes it possible for attackers to upload malicious files that could be used to gain webshell access to a server in versions up to, and including, 4.7.5.
